title: What is the name of the Korean drama where the main male character dies at the first episode in a car crash? - Quora

response.answer_text: He’s obviously NOT the ‘main mail lead’ - it’s Shut Up Flower Boy Band & the main lead is Sung Joon. Myung Soo (L of Infinite) was the second male lead - first drama role I saw him in :D Lee Min Ki (guy who died) was the leader of the BAND in the drama - it was a cameo (cause yeah, he’s a well-known actor).
